markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Inescapable Grasp](/Feats.aspx?ID=6456) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 223 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Wrestler](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=270)

**Prerequisites**
[Wrestler Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6446)

</column>

---

Your grasp has a supernatural quality to it, preventing your foes from easily escaping—with or without magical assistance. If a creature you have [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=77) attempts to use a teleportation spell or effect, it must succeed at a DC 15 flat check or the spell fails. If a creature you have grabbed attempts to [Escape](/Actions.aspx?ID=2296) while under the effect of unfettered movement or a similar effect, it must succeed at a DC 15 flat check or be forced to roll the Escape attempt normally, rather than automatically succeeding.
name: Inescapable Grasp

summary_markdown: Your grasp has a supernatural quality to it, preventing your foes from easily escaping—with or without magical assistance.
text: <title level="1" right="Feat 12" pfs="Standard" > Inescapable Grasp Source Player Core 2 pg. 223 1.1 Archetype Wrestler Prerequisites Wrestler Dedication --- Your grasp has a supernatural quality to it, preventing your foes from easily escaping—with or without magical assistance. If a creature you have grabbed attempts to use a teleportation spell or effect, it must succeed at a DC 15 flat check or the spell fails. If a creature you have grabbed attempts to Escape while under the effect of unfettered movement or a similar effect, it must succeed at a DC 15 flat check or be forced to roll the Escape attempt normally, rather than automatically succeeding.
